text: Ra Anumzamoka tamage avu'ava zanke'ma nehaza vaheku kavua antenka nehakane. Kagra vaheka'a sefura zaminka zamazeri fatgo nehananagi ana zankura zamagesa ontahi'naze. Kagra knazanteti zamazeri haviza hu'nananagi, Kagrama zamazeri fatgoma hu'zankura zamavesra hu'ne. Zamavugosamo'a hankavetino havegna hu'nege'za, zamagu'ama rukrahe'ma hu'zankura zamavesra nehaze.
